mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_STORE S WHERE P.PRODUCT_NAME = S.PRODUCT_NAME ) AS CNT FROM TBL_PRODUCT P WHERE P.BRAND_CODE = #{brandCode} ) X WHERE CNT > 0 ORDER BY PRODUCT_ORDER ASC
SELECT A.*, B.BRAND_NAME FROM TBL_PRODUCT A LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_BRAND B ON A.BRAND_CODE = B.BRAND_CODE WHERE PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}
